description: New for 2013, the GR-10 is the love child of the tried & true GR-9 and the Urban Platform. Perfect for those with feet just a little too wide for GR-9s and destined to be our best selling pedal once the word gets out! • platform top measures 75mm wide x 87mm front to back (GR-9 is 70 x 78mm). • designed for maximum comfort when used with soft-soled shoes • contoured shape for cornering clearance • for use with toe clips and straps • colors: silver, black, copper

description:
Made in Japan by Fujitoshi from two layers of strong, comfortable suede leather with stretch-proof laminate in the middle and heavy-duty, dual-riveted chromed steel buckles.

Yeah...they're expensive, but they'll probably outlast your Kilo TT. 

• sold in pairs

• standard 1.370"x24tpi English-threading (not recommended for use on Phil Wood track hubs due to the thickness of the cog)

description: The track-ready Pistard wheel set offers stiff, semi-deep 28mm alloy rims laced to Miche Primato high flange hubs using stainless Sapim 2.0mm straight-gauge spokes & brass nipples. • 700c clincher • 24h radial front/32h 3X rear • spacing: 100mm front/120mm rear • rear is single-side fixed (includes one lockring) • standard 1.370"x24tpi English cog threading • rim decals are removable • color: satin black rims w/ silver hubs, spokes & nipples • weight: 970g front/1113g rear (including track nuts & lockring) *These are factory-built wheels and are not available in any other color options.

name: Fyxation Session 700 tire
description:
Fyxation urban bicycle tires combine a mix of high durometer rubber, Kevlar puncture protection and aggressive tread patterns and are right at home in the city streets.

The Dual Compound version blends vibrant colors on the sidewalls with a hard black compound (similar to a long wearing touring tire) in the center/contact patch of the tire, a super tough 120TPI carcass w/ Kevlar rolling protection, full wrap-around tread and Fyxation's specially designed pinch-flat protection, the end result is a color tire that is built to last under the toughest urban riding conditions.

• 700c clincher

• bead: steel of folding (choose from options below)

• sizes: 23c, 28, 35c

• colors: black, white, white/black DC, pink/black DC, black whitewall, brown whitewall

name: Kryptonite Evolution Mini-5 U-Lock
description:
Small and mighty, the Kryptonite Evolution Mini-5 provides heavy-duty security in a small package that fits in your back pocket.

The Evo Mini-5 stands up to the thieves with a 13mm hardened Kryptonium TM Steel shackle for great resistance to leverage and the sharpest bolt-cutters (and features an updated disc cylinder design can't be unlocked with a Bic pen). 

Register with Kryptonite for a lifetime of replacement keys and $2000 (USD) anti-theft insurance in the USA and Canada.

• disc-style cylinder delivers high security protection that is pick/drill-resistant

• centrally placed key slot offers added defense against leverage attacks & rotating dust cover protects and extends the life of the lock's internals

• includes 3 stainless steel keys (one key features a built-in light w/ high-intensity bulb and replaceable battery)

• register your key number with Kryptonite's Key Safe Program for easy replacement of lost or worn keys for a minimal fee

• rated 7 on a 10-point system with 1 being simple, deterrent security and 10 being extreme security

• dimensions: 3.25" x 5.5"

• weight: 2.15 lbs

name: Hozan lockring pliers
description:
Stop monkeying around with inferior tools! 

Hozan lockring pliers are a superb pro tool for the frequent user featuring twin serrated jaws to ensure a really strong grip on notched track cog lockrings with zero slippage. 

Ideal for getting a fool proof grip or coaxing lockrings with stripped/damaged notches while vinyl coating on the handles prevents discomfort most often associated with common lockring tools. 

Also designed for use with headset and bottom bracket lockrings.

name: Bern Brentwood helmet
description: The Brentwood is Bern's most popular urban bike helmet for men (and Scrod's personal favorite because it comes in XXXL and he has a gigantic melon), featuring a removable soft visor, sunglass channels for comfortably fitting your shades and well-designed vents to keep you cool. Bern's exclusive Zipmold® foam is a liquid foam injection process that provides a better weight to strength ratio - providing a lighter, lower profile helmet without sacrificing protection. Zipmold® hard foam meets ASTM F 2040, CPSC and EN 1078 standards. • Sink Fit® technology provides a low profile fit and feel • sizes: S - XXXL click here for size chart • colors: matte black, matte cobalt blue, matte gray/red/black 'Bomber', matte black/green 'Bomber' (other colors can be special ordered - please contact us for details) • weight: S/M - 14.1 oz, L/XL - 14.6 oz, XXL/XXXL - 15.8 oz

• 1 1/8" threadless

• clamp: 25.4 or 26.0

• length: 70-120mm

• rise: +/- 6° or +/- 17°

• stack height: 40mm

• weight: 140g (100mm)

• color: polished silver

• 1 1/8" threadless

• clamp: 31.8

• length: 80-100mm

• rise: -17° (level on most bikes)

• stack height: 75mm

• weight: 148g (100mm)

• color: polished silver

description:
Everyone wants Thomson quality but some don't want bulky MTB style. 

Thomson stems are billet machined from 7000 series aluminum for the ultimate strength/weight combination and are 100% 'Merican made.
 
• clamp: 31.8mm

• steerer: 1 1/8" threadless

• rise: +/- 10° or +/- 17°

• stack height: 36mm

• silver or black

description:
Awesome Deda design and great performance at an affordable price!

• 1 1/8" threadless

• 3D forged 6061 aluminum

• +/- 6°

• stack height: 40mm

• clamp: 31.7 (31.8)

• weight: 133g (110mm)

• lengths: 70, 80, 90, 100, 110, 120mm

• colors: black, white

description:
Machined 6066-T6 aluminum w/ 4-bolt front plate & 2-bolt pinch.

• rise: 84/96° or 75/105°

• 1 1/8" threadless

• clamp: 31.8mm

• length: 100 or 110mm

• weight: 151g (100mm)

• colors: black anodized or polished silver

name: Cinelli Ant stem
description:
• forged by 6061 T6 aluminum

• clamp: 31.8mm

• steerer: 1 1/8" threadless

• length: 60mm

• rise: 84/96°

• colors: matte black anodized, gloss white

• weight: 130g

description:
The VAI stem is constructed of 6061-T6 forged aluminum w/ 4 M5 steel bolts and a fancy raised Cinelli logo on the front plate. Features opposing direction rear-mounted steerer pinch bolts and offers excellent weight/performance ratio. 

• +/- 6°

• 1 1/8" threadless

• clamp: 31.8mm

• length: 90, 100 or 110mm

• stack height: 40mm

• colors: matte black or gloss white

• weight: 165g @ 110mm

• colors: matte black and gloss white

name: Dimension stem
description:
Everyone needs something to connect their bars to the rest of their bike and not everyone wants to shell out big bucks for a Thomson or the like. 

Dimension stems are no frills, fully forged 6061-T6 aluminum stems that have a 4-bolt handlebar clamp, very minimal graphics and look great.

• 1 1/8" threadless

• clamp: 25.4, 26.0, 31.8mm

• 83/97° or 73/107°

• length: 70-120mm

• colors: silver, black

name: Nitto Dynamic quill stem
description:
• cold-forged aluminum quill stem

• 1" threaded

• 25.4 or 26.0mm clamp

• 72°

• 45mm range from minimum insertion to max insertion; 
78mm from minimum insertion to top of quill

• available lengths: 80, 90, 100, 110mm

name: Nitto Pearl quill stem
description:
The Pearl is a cold-forged aluminum quill stem with a beautiful brushed/polished finish and a hidden bottom clamp bolt

• 1" threaded

• clamp: 26.0mm

• 71°

• available lengths: 80, 90, 100, 110, 120mm

name: Nitto handlebar shim
description:
These paper-thin stainless steel shims allow you to use a 25.4 diameter bar with a stem made for 26.0 bars.  T

hey may be expensive for such a small part but until someone other than Nitto starts making them or the yen falls against the dollar, that's just the way the cookie crumbles.

name: stem shim - 1" to 1 1/8"
description:
This handy little guy is made of aluminum and allows the use of 1-1/8" threadless stems on 1"  threadless forks. 

• stack height: 38mm

name: Nitto bar end plugs
description: Keep your bar tape from unraveling at the ends with style! Polished, anodized aluminum end cap will fit all Nitto bars or any handlebar with a 19-22mm inner diameter and tightens with a 3mm hex wrench (not included) • sold in pairs • colors: black, silver, gold, blue, red Pro tip: lubricate the rubber insert with a drop of dish soap to make installation/removal easier.

name: Fyxation bar end plugs
description: These are the ultimate replacement for the cheap end plugs that ship with open ended track grips or bar tape and will save your body parts from being gored by an open-ended handlebar. Durable aluminum end cap will fit all bars with a 19-22mm inner diameter and tightens with a 3mm hex wrench (not included) • sold in pairs • outside diameter: 25mm • colors: black, white, pink, orange, green, silver, anodized red * PRO TIP: lubricate the rubber insert with a drop of dish soap to make installation/removal easier.

name: Andel Standard track crankset
description: Seen rebranded by many other companies, Andels are a no-brainer if you're looking for a stiff, economical 144bcd track crankset. • crank arms: cold forged 6061-T6 aluminum • chainring: 46t x 1/8" 7075-T6 aluminum • length: 165mm • BB not included - use with Andel's 110mm JIS square taper bottom bracket • weight: 741g • colors: black, silver, white

name: Andel Deluxe track crankset w/ BB
description: In addition to being stiff and cost efficient like the Andel Standard, the Deluxe version features a two-piece integrated spindle design and includes a sealed cartridge external bearing bottom bracket. • 144bcd • crank arms: cold forged 6061-T6 aluminum • chainring: 48t x 1/8" 7075-T6 aluminum • BB: 68mm English threaded (1.370" x 24tpi), external bearing • length: 165mm • color: silver/black (as shown)

name: IRD Defiant track crankset
description:
Designed to be reminiscent of Campy Nuovo Record and Sugino Mighty cranks of the 1970's. Cold forged, then CNC'd 6061 T6 aluminum arms (not from billet - this makes for a much stronger, more reliable design) have a beautiful highly-polished finish

• 144bcd

• fits JIS square taper bottom brackets (110mm for most set-ups)

• 7075-T6 aluminum 46t chainring (CNC'd and polished)

• 165, 167.5 & 175mm

name: Dura Ace 7710 track crank arms
description: MSRP: $449.99 The choice of many professional track racers, DA 7710 crank arms are stiffer than you'll ever need them to be. We promise. • 144mm BCD • NJS certified • length: 165, 167.5, 170, 172.5, 175mm • 8mm allen wrench, M15 crank bolts and chainring bolts included • Dura Ace 7710 chainring sold separately • color: polished silver • weight: 505g (165mm) • required for use with the Dura Ace 7710 Octalink bottom bracket (sold separately)

name: Sugino 75 track crankset
description: Premium quality Keirin Track Racing NJS certified cold-forged aluminum arms & 46t Sugino 75 chainring • lengths: 165, 162.5. 170, 172.5, 175mm • 144mm BCD • Sugino chainring bolts included • chain compatibility: 1/8" • color: polished silver • recommended for use with the Sugino 75 or Protype 109mm ISO BB (sold separately)

name: Sugino 75 crank arms
description: Premium quality Keirin Track Racing NJS certified forged aluminum arms • length: 165, 170mm • 144mm BCD • chainring bolts included • colors: polished silver, black (other colors can be special ordered - please contact us for details) • recommended for use with the Sugino 75 109mm ISO or Protype 109mm ISO bottom bracket (sold separately)

name: SRAM S300 Courier crankset w/ GXP BB
description:
The SRAM S300 is hands-down the best bang for your buck if you're looking for a lightweight crank that's simple, strong, and dependable.

The addition of the Giga X Pipe offers a legendary and duarble bearing design in a lightweight package.

• crank arms: cold forged 6061-T6 aluminum

• chainring: 48t 3/32" 7075 aluminum w/ black hard-anodized coating & steel chainring bolts

• BCD: 130

• chainline: 42mm

• weight: 820-830g including BB 

• 165 or 170mm

• includes English-threaded GXP Team BB

name: Miche Advanced track crankset
description: • lengths: 165, 170mm (silver only) • 144mm BCD • chainring bolts included • 46, 48 or 49t (silver only - all other colors are 46t only) • requires 68x107mm ISO square taper BB (not included) • colors: silver, black, blue, red, gold (all w/ black chainring) • weight: 594g

name: Sugino RD-2 crankset
description: Sugino has been making high quality cranks in Japan for about a bazillion years. This affordable crankset features melt-forged 6061 aluminum arms and a 48t 3/32" chainring • 130mm bcd • 103mm JIS square-taper BB recommended (sold separately) . • 165 or 170mm

name: Sugino Messenger crankset
description: This affordable crankset features melt-forged 6061 aluminum arms and a stiff 48t 1/8" Messenger chainring • 130mm bcd • 103mm JIS square-taper BB recommended (sold separately) . • 165 or 170mm • colors: black, pink, blue, red, gold

name: Sugino RD-2 crank arms
description: RD-2 crank arms are made of melt-forged 6061 aluminum and are equal parts affordable and attractive. • 130mm bcd • 103mm JIS square-taper BB recommended (sold separately) . • length: 165, 170mm • colors: black, white

name: Sugino 15mm crank bolts
description:
If you've already spent the money on 75s, the bolts holding them on should be sexy too, right?

No need to hunt down high-priced NOS bolts - they're right here!

• chrome finish

• sold in pairs

• washers included

name: Sugino dust caps
description: Designing cranksets, bottom brackets and chainrings for Keirin riders for years, Sugino has built a reputation of being one of the best - if not the best - crank manufacturer on the planet. From their lower priced Messenger cranks to the top of the line NJS rated 75 & Grand Mightys, Sugino's name has always been synonymous with quality. Made of lightweight alloy and machined/finished to perfection, these caps are the perfect finishing touch for your Sugino cranks. • fits all Sugino cranks (and just about any other square-taper cranks) • sold in pairs • recommended for use with Sugino 15mm crank bolts or similar

name: Dura Ace 7710 track chainring
description: MSRP: $214.95 Premium quality, precision engineered chainring specifically designed to compliment Dura Ace 7710 crank arms. • 144 bcd • 3/32" or 1/8" • NJS certified • color: nickel-plated aluminum

name: Sugino Zen track chainring
description:
Machined of stiff 7075 T6 aluminum and polished to perfection, the Zen is one ultra-round, super-rigid ring.

These mighty chainrings also feature the SSGN super smooth tooth profile, which means the tooth valleys are rounder and the side tooth profile is smoother than the standard Sugino 75 rings.

This process helps greatly reduce chain noise and improves ring/chain engagement and wear. 

• 144bcd

• 1/2"x1/8"

• 44-55t (some larger sizes may need to be special ordered)

• colors: polished silver, black

name: Sugino 75 track chainring
description: Lightweight, CNC machined, anodized and NJS stamped/certified for all you ballers • 144 bcd • 1/2" x 1/8" • color: black or polished silver (other colors can be special ordered - please contact us for details) • 46, 47, 48 or 49t

name: Sugino Messenger chainring
description: • anodized T6 aluminum w/ machined teeth • 130bcd • 1/2" x 1/8" • color: black (other colors can be special ordered - please contact us for details) • 42, 44, 46 or 48t

description:
Precision CNC machined 7075/T6 aluminum solid plate chainring is aerodynamic and badass

• 144 bcd

• color: black anodized w/ silver machining and laser-etched logos

• sizes: 45, 46, 47, 48, 49, 50, 51, 52t

• 68mm English threaded (1.370" x 24 tpi)

• NJS approved

• weight: 173g

description:

• ISO square taper

• 68mm English threaded (1.370" x 24 tpi)

• spindle length: 109mm

• weight: 315g

• includes highly-polished spindle, races, cups, lockring, bearings, crank arm bolts and dust shield

name: Protype 109mm ISO sealed-cartridge bottom bracket
description: While the standard loose-ball Sugino 75 BB is certainly baller, not everyone wants to mess with cleaning and repacking their bearings from time to time and would rather be out riding their bike. Enter the Protype - featuring silky-smooth sealed-cartridge bearings, lightweight alloy cups/sleeve and a cro-mo spindle. • 109mm ISO square-taper spindle (perfect for Sugino 75) • 68mm English-threaded (1.370" x 24tpi) • crank arm bolts included *also compatible with Dura Ace 7600 track cranks

name: Shimano UN55 bottom bracket
description: The UN55 is a perfect choice when looking for an economical BB with sealed-cartridge bearings. Just like the UN54 but with a steel NDS cup instead of flimsy plastic. • 68mm English threaded (1.370" x 24tpi)/JIS square-taper - not for use with Sugino 75 or other ISO cranksets • spindle length: 107mm, 110mm, 113mm • weight: 313g (110mm) *Generally, it is the crankset (not the frame) that determines spindle length. Please check what length the crank manufacturer recommends or measure your existing BB.

name: Andel 110mm bottom bracket
description: Made by one of the largest crank/BB manufacturers in the world, the Cobra BB features sealed-cartridge bearings and is designed for use with the Andel track crankset (or any other crankset using a 110mm JIS spindle BB). • 68mm English threaded (1.370" x 24tpi) • JIS square-taper • spindle length: 110mm • crank arm bolts included

name: Miche Primato 107mm ISO bottom bracket
description: For use with Miche Advanced track crankset. • 68mm English-threaded or 70mm Italian-threaded • ISO square-taper • cups install using Park Tool FR-5

name: Cane Creek 110 Classic headset
description: In Cane Creek’s own words, "The 110-Series represents the best a headset can be. The 110 features optimal materials, the most effective seals and the best aesthetics in the market today. Cane Creek is so confident in the strength and durability of the 110-Series that we stand behind each headset with a 110-year, no-questions-asked warranty - all backed by Cane Creek’s unsurpassed customer service." And there you have it. • 1 1/8" threadless • 7075 T-6 Aluminum construction w/ premium stainless steel cartridge bearings • Internally contoured and relieved to minimize weight and maximize strength • "Dual-Seal" crown race seal provides excellent seal efficiency with low friction • low-friction upper bearing seal completely seals bearing from contaminants and is fully captured by top cover; no loose parts • cut in Cane Creek’s Fletcher, NC machining facility • stack height: 16mm top, 12mm bottom • colors: silver, black, red, blue See what our friends at Urban Velo had to say about the 110 Classic here.

name: Cane Creek 110 ZS44 headset
description:
The 110 Series is Cane Creek's top-of-the-line, 100% premium, uncompromised headset series. They've even gone far enough to back it up with a 110 year warranty.

Will work on any frame that requires a 1-1/8" internal Zero Stack headset. Features aluminum cups which get pressed into a 44mm ID oversized head tube (as found on Leader's aluminum frames).

• 1 1/8" threadless zero-stack

• 7075 T-6 Aluminum construction w/ stainless steel cartridge bearings

• "Dual-Seal" crown race seal provides excellent seal efficiency with low friction

• low-friction upper bearing seal completely seals bearing from contaminants and is fully captured by top cover; no loose parts

• precision-machined in Cane Creek’s Fletcher, NC machining facility
 
• stack height: 8mm top, 4mm bottom

• weight: 89g

• colors: silver, black, red, blue

name: Fizik Arione saddle - K:ium rail
description:
K:ium is a special alloy with a high strength-to-weight ratio and excellent vibration damping and 8% weight reduction compared to solid titanium.

If you were a fan of the original Selle Italia Flite saddle then you’ll love the Zoncolan because it's considered a modern equivalent. 

Its shape, low narrow front area and the ﬂex from the hull when you’re riding make it feel nearly identical to the Flite – making this a new classic performance saddle for all kinds of use. 

• Microfeel synthetic cover material is breathable, long lasting and split resistant

Available in black or brown.

name: Fyxation Curve saddle

The Fyxation Curve saddle combines classic track styling with exceptional comfort for a saddle that's just as pleasing to look at as it is to ride.

• synthetic cover w/ chrome plated cro-mo rails

name: Brooks Team Pro Chrome saddle
description:
The Team Professional is a saddle which truly deserves the description 'timeless classic'. 

The title 'Brooks Professional' is embossed on either side just above a precisely hand skived stripe along the side edges, where a little of the glossy leather top surface is removed to reveal the texture and lighter tone of the suede beneath. Large-headed copper rivets are hammered by hand, providing the finishing touch.

• length: 273mm

• colors: black, honey

The Team Pro Classic is simpler, economical version of the Team Professional, featuring tubular steel rivets instead of the large hand-hammered copper rivets.

name: Brooks Swift saddle
description:
The Swift was one of the first "modern" gent's racing saddles offered by Brooks. Featuring a chrome plated steel frame, skived sides and those unmistakeable hand hammered copper rivets you've come to know and love.

• width: 152mm

• length: 280mm

• weight: 495g

• colors: black, antique brown, honey

name: Nitto S-83 seatpost
description:
The S-83 is a very secure twin-bolt seatpost with a beautiful finish to be expected from the masters at Nitto. 

• two-bolt system makes it easy to set saddle angle

• diameter: 27.2

• length: 250mm

• setback: 23mm
 
• weight: 275g

name: Nitto Dynamic 626 seatpost
description:
Aka the "Crystal Fellow", the 626 is a highly polished & anodized silver forged aluminum post w/ a single bolt adjustable clamp. 

• inner diameter is oval for weight savings while maintaining strength

• diameter: 27.2

• length: 300mm

• setback: 14mm

• weight: 270g

name: Miche Supertype seatpost
description:
The always elegant Supertype post is precision machined from AL-6082 and engineered with a safeguard system that retains your saddle in the unlikely event that your main clamp bolt should fail. 

• diameter: 27.2mm

• length: 270mm

• min insertion: 100mm

• offset: 20mm

• tilt adjusts without losing fore aft position

• weight: 265g

• colors: silver, black, red, blue, gold (some colors may need to be special ordered)

name: Velo Orange Grand Cru seatpost
description:
The Grand Cru post has beautifully polished finish and a generous 30.2mm of setback, among the longest ever. This is very important for those who ride certain Brooks saddles having very little fore/aft adjustment due to the short rails.

Adjustment is made from the bottom and the two bolt design makes it easy to dial in saddle angle. 

• inner diameter is ovalized to reduce weight while increasing stiffness & strength

• 27.2 x 300mm

• max height: 230mm

• weight: 254g

name: Thomson Elite 10° setback seatpost
description:
Light enough for road bikes and strong enough for MTB badassery, Thomson Elite posts are 100% American made - machined from billet aluminum and feature an oval inner profile for increased strength and a two-bolt rebuildable clamp.

• 10° setback

• sizes: 26.8, 27.2, 31.6mm

• weight: 188g (27.2x250mm)

• silver or black

name: Deda RS01 seatpost
description:
Deda Elementi components come straight out of Italy, which means unparalleled design and craftsmanship and this seatpost is no exception. 

Even at an entry level price point, Deda has created a dependable seatpost that will leave you worry-free. Constructed of forged 6061 aluminum and with a twin-bolt micro-adjustment head, the RS 01 has many of the attributes of much more expensive posts at a fraction of the cost.

• sizes: 27.2, 31.6mm

• weight: 290g (27.2), 326g (31.8)

• colors: black, white, polished silver

name: Leader SPCA-1 aero carbon seatpost
description:
The lightweight, super strong SPCA-1 is made of 3k carbon, features a dual-bolt micro-adjust clamp and is available in two lengths.

• diameter: 27.2mm

• color: matte carbon

• lengths: 250mm , 300mm

• weight : 230g

name: Civia micro-adjust seatpost
description:
If you're looking for an inexpensive zero-setback micro-adjust post without scouring eBay for a used Thomson, look no further.

• size: 27.2mm

• length: 250mm

• weight: 298g

• colors: black, polished silver

name: Thomson seatpost collar
description:
The Thomson collar utilizes the seatpost bolt/washer/barrel nut combo that has proven to be strong over the years. This fastener combination allows float on both sides of the collar slot ensuring consistent clamping force. The bolt hole angle, height of the collar and offset slot all help create a collar that generates maximum clamping force at only 20-25 inch-lbs of torque.

The perfect piece of jewelry for your Thomson cockpit.

• sizes: 28.6, 29.8, 31.8, 34.9

• colors: black, silver

• weight: approx. 26g

name: Miche Pista chain
description:
• nickel-plated heat-treated steel

• 100 links (including master link)

• 1/2" x 1/8"

• color: silver

name: Izumi Model-V Super Toughness chain
description:
Perfect for the track and overkill for the street, your scrawny chicken legs will <u>not</u> break this chain. NJS certified for professional Kierin racing in Japan - a sign that these chains are unfuckwithable and made to extremely high standards.

• full bushings support precision rollers for a smooth, quiet ride

• stretch-resistant cro-mo steel 

• 106 links (including threaded connector link)

• 1/2" x 1/8"

• color: gold outer/black inner

name: Izumi ECO chain
description:
Made of durable cro-mo steel in Japan, the ECO is an economical, durable choice for all single speed & fixed gear applications.

• 116 links (including master link)

• 1/2" x 1/8"

• colors: black, silver, gold, silver/black, gold/black

name: Izumi 1/8" half link
description:
Proper fixed gear chain tension is critical - too much results in binding and premature drivetrain wear and too little could mean unwanted chain drop.

This special half-link connector allows you to add or subtract half of one link (1/2 inch) from the Izumi V chain or most other 1/8" chains in order to optimize chain tension.

• NJS-style bolt and nut secure attachment

• for use with 1/8" chains only 

• color: black

name: KMC Z410 chain (1/8")
description:
No-frills, wallet-friendly track/BMX chain

• 1/2" x 1/8"

• available in silver, gold, black and a bunch o' colors

name: KMC K710 Kool chain (1/8")
description:
If you're not a weight weenie and want a mighty chain, this is it.

1/2" x 1/8" super-duty chain w/ asymmetric plates for increased strength, stretch proof mushroomed pins and DropBuster anti-drop design 

• color: nickel outer/black inner

name: KMC K710SL chain (1/8")
description:
A lighter version of the K710 Kool Chain, the K710SL is a personal favorite of the RG crew.

1/2" x 1/8" super-duty chain w/ asymmetric plates for increased strength and cutouts to reduce weight, stretch proof mushroomed pins and DropBuster anti-drop design.

• 100 links

• colors: silver, gold, black, white, red, blue

name: KMC K810SL chain (3/32")
description:
1/2" x 3/32" super-duty chain w/ asymmetric plates for increased strength and cutouts to reduce weight, stretch proof mushroomed pins and DropBuster anti-drop design

• 100 links

• color: silver

name: KMC Devil 101 track chain
description:
Boasting a minimum tensile strength of 1000 kg of force, the Devil 101 is a favorite here at RGHQ and can surely handle anything you can put out (and then some). 

Featuring full bushings and KMC's Sealed Locking Technology for long life, you really can't fuck with the Devil. 

• 1/2" x 1/8"

• 112 links (including spring clip connector link)

• color: gold

name: KMC 1/8" half-link
description: This extremely handy little link will add or subtract 1/2 a link (1/2") from your chain, allowing you to move the axle 1/4" forward or backward to dial in chain tension or slam that rear wheel. • for use with 1/8" chains only • available in two versions - black works with all standard KMC chains (and most others), nickel plated works with K710 and K710-SL chains

name: MKS chain tensioners
description:
Don't settle for clunky BMX chain tensioners!

This compact chain tensioner may be small but it is top quality, as everything made in Japan by Mikashima (MKS) is. Although designed for Keirin track racing, the ease of use makes them perfect for your sick fixie. 

• adjustable from 1-3cm using a 3mm allen wrench (included)

• two sizes - 5mm for use on steel frames and 8mm for thicker aluminum track ends (only 5mm is NJS certified for those who may care)

• 5mm sold in pairs, 8mm sold individually

name: Miche track cogs
description: Miche track cogs are made of special heat-treated, nickel-plated steel and use a unique cog carrier that eliminates the repetitious and potentially harmful threading/unthreading that traditional track cogs require. Requires the Miche track cog carrier (sold separately). • 14-18t • 3/32" or 1/8"

name: Miche track cog carrier
description: • 1.370"x24tpi English-threading *Only for use with Miche splined track cogs!

name: EAI Superstar track cogs
description:
The Superstar is a premium-quality track cog machined for Euro-Asia Imports right here in the USA from high-grade stainless steel and hand polished to a pristine mirror finish. 

• standard 1.370"x24tpi English- threading (not recommended for use on Phil Wood track hubs due to the thickness of the cog)

• 13-18t

• 1/8" only

• includes orange pouch w/ magnetic clasp and embroidered EAI logo

• polished finish

name: All-City standard track cogs
description: Same as All-City's stainless steel cogs but cut from cro-mo with a black oxide finish. A high performing, excellent value cog for the baller on a budget. 12-16t cogs are solid, 17-22t feature cutouts for weight savings. • 1/2" x 1/8" • standard 1.370"x24tpi threading • 12-22t

name: All-City stainless steel track cogs
description:
CNC'd from hardened stainless steel and polished to a mirror finish, these premium cogs run quiet and look amazing while still being easy on the wallet. 

15 & 16t cogs are solid, 17-19t feature cutouts for weight savings.

• 1/2" x 1/8"

• standard 1.370"x24tpi threading

• 15-19t

name: Dura Ace track cogs
description:
Shimano Dura Ace cogs are made from hardened steel for long life and have standard 1.370"x24tpi threading

• 13-16t only

• 3/32" or 1/8"

name: cro-mo track cogs
description:
Tough as nails 1/8" track cog CNC'd from a chunk of hardened cro-mo with a nice, slightly-bronzed matte finish.

• 14-20t

• standard 1.370"x24tpi threading

name: one dollar cogs
description: We're not claiming these are the quietest, roundest, most amazing cogs you'll ever use (it's a dollar, for fuck's sake!) but they will be perfect for your winter beater or if you're thinking about trying a different gear ratio but are hesitant to drop money on a fancy cog you may not like. • standard 1.370"x24tpi (English) threading *all proceeds will benefit the Retrogression Beer Fund.

name: Dura Ace lockring
description: Shimano Dura Ace lockrings are made of hardened steel and have standard 1.29"x24 tpi left-hand threads (fits all but Campy, Miche Mavic and Phil Wood)

name: 'Steel Reserve' stainless steel lockring
description: No-nonsense lockring CNC'd from hardened stainless steel to keep that cog from wandering off on you. • uniform thickness prevents your lockring tool from slipping behind it as you crank it down • standard 1.29"x24 tpi left-hand thread (English) • made right here in 'Merica *will NOT work on Phil Wood, Miche, Campagnolo or other Italian-threaded track hubs!

name: 'Riserva Acciaio' stainless steel lockring (Italian-thread)
description: The Italian cousin of the Steel Reserve lockring, the Riserva Acciaio is cut from hardened stainless steel and features uniform 4mm thickness. • Italian 33.5mm x 24 tpi left-hand thread (fits Campy, Miche Phil Wood, Mavic) *will NOT work on Formula, Novatec, All-City, Gran Compe, Dura Ace, Suzue or other English-threaded track hubs!

name: Shimano MX30 freewheel
description: Hey...for whatever reason, there are people out there who like to coast... 16, 17 or 18 tooth Shimano freewheels can be installed on either fixed or free side on any standard rear track hub • for use with 3/32" or 1/8" chains • chrome/black finish

name: Halo Fix-T cover
description:
Do the unused threads on the other side of your flip/flop hub keep you up at night? Cover them little bastards up!

The Fix-T Cover keeps unwanted muck out of you threads and gives you hub a clean, sleek aesthetic.

• standard 1.37x24tpi threads

• fits both freewheel and fixed sides

• color: black, white, blue, red, purple, gold, green

name: Alex AT400/Novatec track wheelset
description: The Alex AT400 is a relatively lightweight, durable double-walled box-section-style eyeletted rim made of 6061-T6 aluminum. Laced 3X to tried and true Novatec track hubs using 14g straight-gauge stainless steel spokes and brass nipples, this wheelset is stylish and bombproof while still being relatively light. • 700c clincher • 32h MSW • spacing: 100mm front/120mm rear • sealed cartridge bearings • rear hub is fixed/fixed • color: silver or black • weight: 942g front/946g rear

name: Velo Orange Grand Cru track wheelset
description: Built using Grand Cru high flange hubs laced to VO PBP rims with DT Swiss 2.0 spokes, these wheels would be right at home on any vintage conversion or classic-style modern build. • 700c clincher • 32h front & rear • spacing: 100mm front/120mm rear 120mm rear (includes spacers to make them 130mm or 135mm) • rear is fixed/fixed • standard 1.370"x24tpi English cog threading • color: polished silver • weight: 968 front/1016 rear (including axle nuts)

name: Araya SA-30 rim
description:
A re-incarnation of the classic SA-30 Super Aero from the 80's but with a bit more strength and more of a defined braking surface (if that's your thing).

For those of you not in the know, Araya was and still is one of the top manufacturers of rims in Japan. So there.

• 700c clincher

• ERD: 580mm

• 24, 28, 32 or 36h

• non-machined side wall (but suitable for use with brakes)

• color: high-polish silver

• weight: 540g

name: HED Belgium C2 rim
description:
The Belgium C2 rim is one of the new generation of rims having a slightly wider 23mm width that delivers plenty of strength, aerodynamics and solid handling. 

In fancy hype-talk, HED named their C2 series rims after the lower coefficient of rolling resistance (Crr) and higher aerodynamics (Cda) provided by the 23mm wide rims. With 23c tires, the C2 rim creates a constant tire profile, rather than getting pinched into the rim. The overall ride quality is improved and the result is tubular-like ride quality from a clincher tire. The smooth transition from the tire to the edge of the rim allows laminar air flow and lower aerodynamic drag.

• 700c clincher

• ERD: 592mm

• material: G609 AL

• invisible welded rim joint

• 24, 28 or 32h 

• machined side wall w/ wear indicators - suitable for use with brakes 

• colors: all black (anodized after machining for a clean, non-machined look) or black w/ silver sidewall

• weight: 470g

options.name: HED Belgium C2 rim - all black - 28h
HED Belgium C2 rim - all black - 32h
HED Belgium C2 rim - black w/ silver sidewall - 24h
HED Belgium C2 rim - black w/ silver sidewall - 28h
HED Belgium C2 rim - black w/ silver sidewall - 32h

name: H+Son Archetype rim
description:
The perfect all around road rim. At 450 grams, this rim has proven to be light yet not sacrificing strength, stiffness, and stability. 

The well-accepted 23mm wide profile mimics a tubular tire, where the advantage can be felt immediately while taking corners as the tire is no longer shaped as a light bulb, flopping over with high load. 

• 700c clincher

• ERD: 595mm

• material: G609 AL

• invisible welded rim joint

• 24, 28 or 32h (silver and hard-anodized available in 32h only)

• machined side wall  - suitable for use with brakes (rims are anodized after machining for a non-machined look)

• colors: black, polished silver, hard anodized

• weight: 450g

options.name: H Son Archetype rim - polished silver - 32h
H Son Archetype rim - hard anodized - 32h

name: H+Son Formation Face rim
description:
Formation Face is a true "V" profile rim. Without any stress points in the sidewall, the uniform triangle shape improves the rim's lateral stiffness in comparison to SL42. The simple profile shape also saves weight by reducing the distance between the bead hook and the spoke bed. 

Because of the thinness of the sidewalls, technical hurdles had to be overcome in engineering a welded joint. Despite the profile height, H+Son were able to reduce the weight to around 615g using the G609 aluminum alloy - which is also 30 percent stronger than the 6061 aluminum alloy used in standard rim manufacture.

• 700c clincher

• ERD: 557mm

• 32h

• not for use with rim brakes (at all, ever)

• colors: black, gold, white, high-polished silver

• weight: 615g

options.name: H Son Formation Face rim - black
H Son Formation Face rim - gold
H Son Formation Face rim - white
H Son Formation Face rim - high-polished silver

name: H+Son SL42 rim
description:
Like Formation Face, the SL42 owes its stiffness and aerodynamics to 42mm profile height. The two models share the same lightness, reduced to around 615g using the G609 aluminum alloy which is also 30 percent stronger than the 6061 aluminum alloy typically used in rim manufacture. 

• 700c clincher

• ERD: 557mm

• drillings: 24, 32, 36h (silver only available in 32h)

• machined side wall  - suitable for use with brakes (black rims are anodized after machining)

• colors: black, high-polish silver, white

• weight: 615g

options.name: H Son SL42 rim - high-polished silver - 32h

name: H+son F30 rim
description:
The F30 is a 30mm deep true "V" profile rim featuring non-machined, flush surface sidewalls - not for use with rim brakes!

• 700c clincher

• ERD: 580mm

• 32h

• weight: 570g

• welded joint

• color: gloss black

name: H+Son TB14 rim
description:
The TB14 was inspired by the classic aesthetic of rims from the era when steel frames ruled competitive cycling and benefits from contemporary improvements in rim manufacture and profile design. From sourcing double eyelets to crafting new molds for the valve badge and its hardware, H+Son dedicated neurotic attention and careful detail to every aspect of this rim.

The wider rim adds stiffness and gives a profile that resembles a tubular tire - an advantage which can be immediately felt when taking corners as the tire is no longer shaped like a light bulb and flopping over with high loads.

The TB14 is made with the stiffer and stronger G609 aluminum alloy and features H+Son's unique and invisible welded joint. Rims are anodized after machining.

• 700c clincher

• ERD: 610mm

• 32h

• colors: black, polished silver, hard-anodized (gray)

• weight: 490g

options.name: H Son TB14 rim - polished silver

name: Velo Orange PBP rim
description:
VO's PBP rim is an attractive, simple box-section rim featuring double-wall aluminum construction, stainless steel eyelets and a beautiful polished finish

• 700c clincher

• width: 19mm outside/13.2mm inside

• ERD: 606mm

• 32 or 36h

• color: polished silver

• weight: 450g

name: Velocity A23 rim
description: The A23 is based on Velocity's proven Aerohead race rim. Having a wider 23mm footprint, the A23 easily accommodates wider tires and also allows for a more aerodynamic rim/tire combination. When paired with a 23c tire, the wider rim creates a consistent tire profile rather than pinching the beads into the rim. The overall ride quality is improved and the result is tubular-like ride quality from a standard clincher tire. • 700c clincher • ERD: 601mm • drillings: 20, 24, 28, 32, 36 • weight: 426g • black available with machined (MSW) or non-machined (NMSW) sidewalls *Due to the wide (and ever-changing) range of options offered by Velocity, we may be able to special order other colors/drillings - which typically take 3-4 business days to arrive here.

name: Chub Fixed Rear hub
description: The Chub Fixed Rear is made up of two oversized aluminum flanges bonded to a massive carbon shell. It rolls on sealed cartridge bearings, employs an alloy 15mm thru axle and bolts to the frame using titanium M10 bolts. As compared to a typical high flange fixed gear hub using the same spoke count, rim, and build method, the Chub decreases peak spoke stress under pedaling loads by a staggering 70%! Reducing peak spoke stress means your wheels wind up less, accelerate faster, and won’t blow up under the pressure unleashed by your massive quads. • 32h (24h may be available for special order - please contact us for details) • spacing: 120mm (130mm available for special order) • fixed/fixed • standard 1.370"x24tpi threading • flange diameter: 101.6mm • center to flange: 35mm • color: black • weight: 296g

name: Sapim CX-Ray spokes
description: Sapim’s CX-Ray bladed aero spoke is the leading choice of champions, having an aerodynamic advantage over round spokes and building lighter, stronger wheels. With a weight nearly 30% lighter than standard double butted spokes, you would expect to give up strength. CX-Ray spokes withstand more than 3.5 million load reversals in fatigue tests, 3x more than any spoke on the road. Produced from high-tensile 18/8 stainless steel which is ideally suited for the rigorous demands of spokes, even downhill racers use CX-Rays because of their strength and durability. • 2.0/.9/2.0mm bladed (no hub filing required) • weight : 278g (64 x 260mm) • black or silver • available lengths: 212-302mm (even lengths only) • nipples not included A very accurate, easy to use spoke calculator can be found here. (Please attach a note with your payment specifying which length spokes you need.) *Price shown is for one spoke - please update total number of spokes needed in cart before checking out. In most cases, spokes are ordered as needed from our supplier, which typically take 2-3 days to arrive here before being sent out. Spokes and nipples are NOT returnable!

name: Sapim Laser spokes
description: Sapim's super light butted spokes have two major benefits - less weight and more strength. Technological advances using cold forging "stretch" the spoke, retaining the linear molecular structure of the material and increasing the spoke strength at the middle by at least 48%. • 2.0/1.5/2.0mm butted • weight : 279g (64 x 260mm) • black or silver • available lengths: 229-301mm (odd lengths only) • nipples not included A very accurate, easy to use spoke calculator can be found here. (Please attach a note with your payment specifying which length spokes you need.) *Price shown is for one spoke - please update total number of spokes needed in cart before checking out. In most cases, spokes are ordered as needed from our supplier, which typically take 2-3 days to arrive here before being sent out. Spokes and nipples are NOT returnable!

name: Wheelsmith DB14 spokes
description: Wheelsmith is a name that all wheel builders will know well. Founded in 1975 when they began creating quality products from a garage in Palo Alto, California, their reputation for building awesome wheels rocketed them to nationwide stardom and they now supply a good chunk of the spokes you'll see rolling around the road or trail. These double butted spokes get double benefit by being lighter due to the lack of center material and stronger due to the more traditional 2.0mm head and thread areas. Buy Wheelsmith spokes with ultimate confidence! • 2.0/ 1.7/ 2.0mm butted • black or silver • nipples not included • available lengths: 236-302mm (even lengths only) A very accurate, easy to use spoke calculator can be found here. (Please attach a note with your payment specifying which length spokes you need.) *Price shown is for one spoke - please update total number of spokes needed in cart before checking out. In most cases, spokes are ordered as needed from our supplier, which typically take 2-3 days to arrive here before being sent out. Spokes and nipples are NOT returnable!

name: Continental Grand Prix 4000 tire
description: The Grand Prix 4000 is Continental's most advanced racing clincher, with a truly unique blend of speed and durability. Thanks a bevy of exclusive high tech materials - and years of testing and development - the GP4000 manages to preserve its low rolling resistance and great handling while providing exceptional puncture protection and higher mileage performance than a typical race tire. There are two separate versions - those with colored tread (which use an activated silica rubber compound) and those with black tread (which use the Black Chili rubber compound). The colored rubber gives great rolling resistance and lively handling, while the special Xirallic pigmentation process ensures vibrant hues mile after mile. An additional anti-tear formula has also been added for wear resistance and longevity of tread life. The Black Chili Rubber features an ultra dense construction and even higher silica content for outstanding grip and blazing speeds. This cutting-edge compound is also optimized for reliability and longevity, making it a great choice when both performance and durability are top priorities. • 700c clincher • folding Kevlar bead • Vectran Puncture Barrier for outstanding flat protection without excess weight • Three ply casing with 330 total TPI • 120 max. recommended PSI • sizes: 20, 23, 25c • colors: black, yellow, red, blue, orange, silver, black reflex (reflective stripe) • weight: 205g (700x23) *note: the black version of the GP4000 is actually identical to the GP4000 S

name: All-City Big Block Fifth Anniversary frameset

name: Knog Blinder Standard
description: The Knog Blinder has four super bright LEDs that pump out up to 80 Lumens of front light and 44 Lumens of rear light. Its optimized optics focus and directs a smooth beam pattern that is visible over 2500 feet. With five different modes and a burn time of up to 3 hours in constant beam and up to 50 hours (in Eco-flash mode), they will keep you well seen. • 100% waterproof design • integrated USB charging without the use of a cable • unique stainless steel cam silicon strap fits standard to oversized bars/seatposts • 4 flash patterns • low battery indicator • colors: black, blue, silver, red

name: Crane Suzu Mini headset spacer-mount bell
description: Finally! For all those who love the mini headset-mounted bell on Scrod's Bare Knuckle, Japan's trusty Crane Bell Co. has come along with these dandy little gems. • 45mm dome • spring-loaded lever strike mechanism • 10mm spacer mount fits 1" or 1-1/8" w/ included shim • copper, brass or aluminum (all three have distinctly different tones)

name: Kryptonite Evolution Mini-7 U-Lock w/ Flex Cable
description:
Heavy-duty security in a compact, easily transportable design.

The Evo Mini-7 stands up to the thieves with a 13mm hardened Kryptonium TM Steel shackle for great resistance to leverage and the sharpest bolt-cutters (and features an updated disc cylinder design can't be unlocked with a Bic pen). 

Register with Kryptonite for a lifetime of replacement keys and $2000 (USD) anti-theft insurance in the USA and Canada.

• disc-style cylinder delivers high security protection that is pick/drill-resistant

• centrally placed key slot offers added defense against leverage attacks & rotating dust cover protects and extends the life of the lock's internals

• includes 3 stainless steel keys (one key features a built-in light w/ high-intensity bulb and replaceable battery)

• 4 ft. KryptoFlex™ 10mm-thick braided steel, double-loop cable provides good cut resistance for securing a front wheel or accessories

• register your key number with Kryptonite's Key Safe Program for easy replacement of lost or worn keys for a minimal fee

• rated 7 on a 10-point system with 1 being simple, deterrent security and 10 being extreme security

• dimensions: 3.25" x 7"

• weight: 3.15 lbs

name: Crud Roadracer MK2 fenders
description: Crud Roadracer MK2 fenders work wonders regardless of whether your bike has clearance for traditional fenders and provide full-coverage protection from water, mud and debris at a stunningly light weight. • attaches in minutes using easily adjusted rubber fittings • unique design uses replaceable filament brushes that "float" the fender off rims and center them over tires • designed to fit 700c bikes with minimal fender clearance • maximum tire size: 25mm (some 28c tires may fit) • width: 33mm • weight: 180g/pair *a minimum 4mm of clearance is required between the tire and the closest part of the frame/fork for proper installation

name: Hozan lockring tool
description:
The Hozan lockring spanner is a must have for your work shop and/or mobile tool kit. 

The hook-style tool fits most track cogs, bottom bracket lockrings, some threaded headset lockrings and is light enough to carry with you if need be. 

Cold-forged for maximum strength, your arm is likely to break before this tool does.

10.5" length/3.5mm thick

name: Park Tool SR-18 chain whip
description:
1/8" chain fits all fixed gear cogs

Heat-treated steel with molded handle for comfort

1" box end wrench fits Park Tool freewheel/cassette lockring tools

name: Park Tool CT-3.2 deluxe chain tool
description: A shop favorite updated for 2013, the CT-3.2 features an adjustable locating shelf to accommodate any bike chain - from 5 to 11-speed derailleur chains to 1/8"and 3/16" track/BMX chains. Made from tough-as-nails investment cast steel for strength and durability, the large fine-threaded handle gives high leverage and means easy removal of chain rivets, has a replaceable driving pin head if it should ever bend or break and includes a "loosening shelf" to release stiff links after assembly. *Will not work on Campagnolo chain rivets.

name: Park Tool CTP replacement chain tool pins
description: It really sucks when the pin on your chain tool breaks from not being aligned with the chain correctly but at least they're replaceable! These pins fit Park Tool's CT-1, CT-2, CT-3, CT-3.2, CT-5, and CT-7 Chain Tools and are easy to change using a 7mm or 9/32" 12 point box wrench/socket (or pliers if you're a caveman). Made from hardened tool-grade steel and sold in packages of two.

name: Cyclo Rivoli chain tool
description: This handy little universal chain tool was designed for 9/10 speed chain but also works like a charm on track/BMX chains (3/32" or 1/8") with thick or oddly-shaped side plates - like the KMC K710-SL - and is small enough to carry with you wherever you may roam.

name: Park Tool CWP-7 universal crank puller
description: The universal design of the CWP-7 has a rotating tip pressed into each end of the tool (11.3mm and 16.3mm) so it will remove both square taper and splined (ISIS Drive, Octalink) crank arms and is made for the 22x1mm threading in common cranks.

name: Park Tool BBT-22 bottom bracket tool
description: Shop-quality tool for installing and removing standard Shimano 20-tooth bottom bracket cups Can be turned with a 3/8" drive torque wrench, 3/8" ratchet driver, 26mm wrench, 1" wrench, 1" socket or the hex end of the SR-18 chain whip. *PRO TIP: use a 2" bolt with the same diameter/threading as your crank arm bolt to gently secure the BBT-22 to the spindle before using.

name: Park Tool BBT-19 bottom bracket tool
description: Shop quality tool for installing and removing Shimano, SRAM/Truvativ, Race Face, FSA and Campagnolo 16-notch external bearing bottom bracket cups Can be turned with a 3/8" drive torque wrench, 3/8" ratchet driver, 26mm wrench, 1" wrench, 1" socket or the hex end of the SR-18 chain whip.

name: Park Tool BBT-5 bottom bracket tool
description: The BBT-5 is essential when installing and removing Campy or Miche Primato bottom bracket cups. Can be turned with a 32mm wrench, 1" wrench, 1" socket or the hex end of the SR-18 chain whip. *PRO TIP: use a crank arm bolt to gently secure the FR-5 to the spindle before using.

name: VAR compact tire bead jack
description: Finally back in production by popular demand! Specifically designed for road tires, this handy little tool works as a tire "jack" to lift and seat the tire bead, includes a removable lever to be used as second tire lever and - unlike the Kool Stop tire bead jack - is small enough to bring anywhere. Very slightly redesigned and improved from previous versions with a stiffer inner lever (and a new color). Made of nylon reinforced with fiberglass for increased durability and to help prevent damage to rims, tires and tubes. • measures 135x22x22mm

name: Portland Design Works 3wrencho
description:
The PDW 3wrencho is made of tough heat-treated steel, tightens/removes 15mm axle nuts, can pry tires off of rims with ease and is tiny enough to fit into the pocket of your skinniest jeans. 

The extremely durable glass-filled nylon coating is gentle on anodized and powdercoated finishes.

Other uses: spreading jelly, stirring a drink, opening letters, tongue depressor, etc.

name: Portland Design Works Shiny Object C02 Inflator
description:
The Shiny Object is made of indestructible alloy, fits both Presta and Schrader valves and - unlike most other inflators - features a handy control knob to regulate how fast the C02 is released.

• can be used with any threaded C02 cartridges

• C02 cartridges <u>not</u> included

name: EAI Keirin Tote bag
description: The Euro Asia Imports Keirin Tote is a great accessory for any track racer or street warrior. It has pockets for all your chainrings, cogs, and tools (including one long enough for a chain whip) and will hold just about everything you need for a day at the races. Unfold it to have easy access to everything you need then fold it up into a tidy, compact square and carry it home. Includes a laminated gear inch chart so you can calculate exactly what you need for the next race. • heavyweight cordura construction • measures approx. 10x12" (folded) • color: blue/black *hang straps and tools, cogs, chainrings, etc. are not included

name: wheel building
description: Instead of us sending you a separate invoice for wheel build labor charges, you can now simply add it to your cart along with your rims, hubs, spokes and nipples if you would like us to build your wheels for you (choose single wheel or wheelset from the menu below). Turnaround time for custom wheels is typically 7-10 days. *Please let us know what lacing pattern you would like us to use. If nothing is specified, wheels will be laced 3X.

name: E-Certificates
description: After buying an E-Certificate, you will receive an e-mail containing a downloadable, printable certificate which will have a unique code to be entered at checkout of a future purchase, redeemable for the dollar amount specified. • available in $25, $50, $75, $100, $150, $200 and $1,000,000 • only redeemable online • no expiration date • codes are only valid for one use and can not be combined with any other coupon/sale codes *This is a gift certificate to be printed out by the purchaser. You will not receive anything in the mail!
